specialEventConditions.title: New Years 2024-25
specialEventConditions.description:
All bookings from 14th December to January 4th are non-refundable and charged upon reservation.

There is no check in or outs on the following dates. December 25th, 26th, 30th, 31st and January 1st and 2nd.

All bookings between 23th December -  25th December have a 2 night minimum stay.
All bookings between 26th December - Jan 3th have a 6 night minimum stay.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
